<noinclude>
This template creates a warning box for highlighting critical information.

== Usage ==
<pre>
{{Warning|Your warning text here}}
</pre>

== Parameters ==
* '''1''' - The warning text (required)

[[Category:Templates]]
</noinclude><includeonly><div class="df-admonition df-warning">
'''⚠️ Warning:''' {{{1}}}
</div></includeonly>
